Name: Taurian Defense Force
Details: The Taurian Defense Force is responsible for the defense of the Taurian Concordat and consists of its Army, Navy and Aerospace arms, with its supreme commander being Protector Thomas Calderon, the leader of the Concordat. The TDF is considered one of the best Periphery militaries and carry their defensive mission with fanatical devotion, often resorting to any means to stop outside aggression.
